titleStmt.title: Infant-baptisme justified by a nevv discovery and also, several scripture allegories adjusted upon the like account. By William Parker clerk, incumbent of Wrotham in Kent.
titleStmt.author: Parker, William, fl. 1651-1658.

notesStmt.note: Caption title on p. 1 reads: Infant baptism justified by a nevv discovery.
The final page contains a postscript.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
